A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hard to believe that any fan of the original films could like this one. I thought VII was bad until I saw VIII. GAPING plot holes\, cookie-cutter\, made-for-the-masses crap sandwich. I'm surprised they weren't selling Porg stuffed animals in the lobby. Not giving anything away\, but there's a \"prank call\" sequence early in the movie that seemed like a parody of Star Wars they'd do on SNL or The Onion. Cornball one-liners throughout during heavy situations. And don't even get me started on the propaganda! Hopefully\, the side stories like Rogue One continue to deliver because the main trilogy films have lost the magic of those Lucas touched. If this was a Star Wars movie\, then I'm a Pentecostal preacher!
